name: Ability Thief
description: Steal the Ability of your target when you use a move that makes contact with them.

name: Ace
description: As a master of your element, your Attack Type bonus is raised from 25% to 100%.

name: Adorable
description: Distract your foes with your captivating charm as you enter battle, lowering their Melee Defense.

name: Aggressive
description: Get a Melee Attack boost each time you knock out another Loomian.

name: Ambush
description: Attack with double power if your target entered the battle this turn.

name: Analyze
description: Identify whether the opponents' Melee or Ranged Defenses are weaker, and boost your own respective Attack.

name: Anomaly
description: During battle, when this Loomian's stats should increase, they instead decrease, and vice-versa.

name: Appetite
description: Continually feeding on a sugary substance, this Loomian loses a little Health each turn to boost two random stats.

name: Applied Frustration
description: When any of your stats are lowered, you focus your anger to sharply boost your Ranged Attack.

name: Apprehension
description: You get uneasy when you detect a foe has a move that is powerful against you.

name: Aqua Body
description: This Loomian takes reduced damage from Fire-type moves, and cannot be inflicted with a burn.

name: Awakening
description: Raises your Attack Type Bonus from 25% to 50%.

name: Baneful
description: Deal 20% more damage to opponents which are infected with poison.

name: Bitter Touch
description: When another Loomian's move comes into contact with you, they may become filled with regret, becoming unable to use that move again for a few turns.

name: Blistering Heat
description: You can poison any Loomian regardless of their type. Your Fire-type moves have a small chance to poison the target.

name: Bloodsucker
description: Moves that leech the opponent's health have boosted Strength.

name: Boast
description: Brag as you join the fight. Boosts your Melee Attack if it's greater than your foe's, reduces it otherwise.

name: Brute Force
description: Removes secondary effects of your moves to deal pure, increased damage.

name: Bug Fever
description: Gain a sharp Attack boost when you KO a foe using a Bug-type move.

name: Bully
description: When targeting a foe which is shorter than you, bypass their Ability and positive stat boosts.

name: Burglar
description: When making contact with the foe, you will swipe their item. If you already have an item, their item will be discarded.

name: Bursting Seams
description: After consuming an item, there is a chance you will get it back at the end of the turn.

name: Caddie
description: If carrying an item when an ally uses up its own item, you will pass your item to the ally.

name: Captivating
description: Capture the attention of your opponents, redirecting their attacks at you.

name: Chaperone
description: Protects allies who share a type with this Loomian from being inflicted with status ailments or having their stats lowered.

name: Chill
description: Your Typeless moves become Ice-type. The Strength of these moves is boosted a little.

name: Circadian
description: Rotate between Light- and Dark-type each turn in battle.

name: Clingy
description: This Loomian refuses to let go of its item.

name: Clutch
description: When this Loomian is at full Health, and is struck by a move that would knock it out, it hangs on with just 1 Health.

name: Combative
description: When any of your stats are lowered, focus your rage to sharply boost your Melee Attack.

name: Combustible
description: When struck by a Fire-type attack, this Loomian absorbs it to boost the Strength of its own Fire-type moves.

name: Communication
description: The Loomian understands when its allies are attacking, and is able to dodge their moves.

name: Compliant
description: Help your team follow your trainer's orders, even when the foe tries to force you to use certain moves.

name: Confidence
description: This Loomian does not flinch.

name: Contact Curse
description: When another Loomian's move comes into contact with you, they lose some Energy.

name: Coursing Venom
description: When struck by a Toxic-type attack, it is absorbed and this Loomian's Toxic-type attacks are strengthened.

name: Dauntless
description: Get a Melee Attack boost when entering battle if your foe has an attack which is strong against your type.

name: Dawn
description: Increases your Ranged Attack when in battle with an ally with the Dawn or Dusk Ability.

name: Defensive Priority
description: Upon entering battle, harshly reduce your Speed to boost your Melee Defense and Ranged Defense.

name: Devious
description: When attacking, bypass the target's Ability.

name: Double Strike
description: When attacking, this Loomian hits the opponent a second time with reduced strength.

name: Drainage
description: Drainage increases the Health gained from using health-draining moves by 50%.

name: Driven
description: When the Loomian flinches during combat, it boosts its Speed to compensate.

name: Dusk
description: Increases your Melee Attack when in battle with an ally with the Dawn or Dusk Ability.

name: Early Bird
description: Wake up from sleep twice as fast as others.

name: Enchant
description: When this Loomian uses a damaging move in battle, it has a small chance to leave the target dazed.

name: Enchanted Coat
description: This Loomian takes reduced damage from super-effective moves.

name: Expertise
description: This Loomian's moves cost 25% less Energy.

name: Fanning Flame
description: When struck by an Air-type attack, take reduced damage and receive a boost in Ranged Attack.

name: Festive Spirit
description: This Loomian's Ranged Attack stat is equal to its current energy.

name: Finesse
description: Attack with great tact, bypassing hurdles your opponents may have set up, such as Scapegoat.

name: Flutter
description: The wind generated by your wings protects you from powders and entry hazards.

name: Forge
description: When struck by a Fire-type attack, take reduced damage and receive a boost in Melee Attack.

name: Frail Armor
description: When struck by a Melee attack, this Loomian experiences a decrease in Melee Defense and a sharp increase in Speed.

name: Frenzy
description: After knocking out another Loomian in battle, you gain as much Energy as they had remaining.

name: Glide
description: When an Air-type attack is used by any Loomian in battle, you gain a boost in speed.

name: Glutton
description: The effects of some edible items are boosted.

name: Guardian
description: The effects of some edible items are boosted.Protect your ally Loomians when they take hits in battle, reducing the damage they receive.

name: Gummy
description: You are immune to bomb-like attacks.

name: Guru
description: The Strength of your weak moves is boosted.

name: Handy
description: This Loomian's support moves tend to go first.

name: Handy
description: Your Melee Defense is boosted by 50%, but you're weak to Water-type moves.

name: Harmonize
description: When inflicted with a status ailment by an opponent's move, the opponent will be inflicted with the same ailment.

name: Hasty
description: Fight with increased Melee Attack, but lower Accuracy.

name: Heavy Fists
description: Attacks that involve punching or slapping deal 50% more damage.

name: Herd Behavior
description: Copy your allies' stat boosts.

name: High Explosive
description: Bomb-like attacks deal 50% more damage, but have no secondary effects.

name: Idiosyncratic
description: This Loomian has specialized their skills. Their Melee and Ranged stats are swapped compared to others of their species.

name: Ignorant
description: When attacking or being attacked, this Loomian is oblivious to the foe's stat boosts, causing them to have no effect.

name: Illuminate
description: Typeless moves take on the Light type. The Strength of these moves is boosted a little.

name: Immunized
description: This Loomian is immune to status ailments.

name: Incandescent
description: The Strength of your Light-type moves is boosted by 50%.

name: Insulated
description: Ice and Fire-Type moves deal half as much damage to you.

name: Lazy
description: This Loomian tends to move last in battle.

name: Life Force
description: This Loomian's moves cost Health instead of Energy. It costs 10 Health to use any move.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Attracts all Electric-type moves to this Loomian, which absorbs them to boost its Ranged Attack.

name: Lucky
description: Moves with secondary effects have double the chances of their secondary effect activating.

name: Madcap
description: Strike with increased Strength when using reckless moves.

name: Marksman
description: Critical hits deal increased damage.

name: Malware
description: Any Loomian which makes contact when attacking you has its Ability replaced with Malware.

name: Master
description: When you knock out another Loomian, get a boost based on your greatest strength.

name: Mean Spirited
description: Attack 20% stronger when the target is afflicted with a status ailment.

name: Mysterious Cloak
description: This Loomian is protected from all damage that doesn't come directly from a Loomian's move.

name: Mystery Toxins
description: Opponents that make contact with you may be inflicted randomly with sleep, poison, or paralysis.

name: Mystic Tone
description: When an opponent's attack causes contact with this Loomian, it responds by summoning a random allies' move.

name: Neutralize
description: All of your moves become Typeless. The Strength of these moves is boosted a little.

name: Nightmarish
description: Haunt the dream of sleeping opponents, causing them damage each turn.

name: Noxious Weeds
description: When a Plant-type attack attempts to strike this Loomian the move is choked out by weeds, boosting the Strength of this Loomian's own Plant-type moves.

name: Odd Husk
description: This Loomian is protected against the secondary effects of moves that hit it.

name: Overcharged
description: The Strength of all Loomians' Electric-type moves are boosted 30% while this Loomian is on the battlefield.

name: Overshadow
description: Typeless moves take on the Dark type. The Strength of these moves is boosted a little.

name: Oxidize
description: When hit by a Water or Air Type move, you will lose speed and gain Melee Defense.

name: Parting Gift
description: When this Loomian is knocked out, it leaves behind a gift that explodes on the Loomian across from it, which deals a random amount of damage.

name: Pincer Trap
description: Attacks that involve biting will trap the target in the battle until the end of the next turn.

name: Pitch-Black
description: Boosts the strength of your Dark-type attacks.

name: Playful
description: Any boosts you receive during battle are shared with ally Loomians.

name: Power Jaw
description: Biting attacks deal 50% more damage.

name: Power Napper
description: Restore some Health when withdrawn from battle.

name: Premonition
description: Identifies the opponent's most powerful move as soon as you enter the fight.

name: Prismatic
description: When struck by a Light-type attack, it is absorbed and this Loomian's Light-type attacks are strengthened.

name: Protective Shell
description: Your critical vulnerabilities are protected by a hard shell. This prevents you from receiving critical hits in battle.

name: Pyro
description: This Loomian's Fire-type moves have 50% more Strength and cost 25% more Energy.

name: Quick Recovery
description: When leaving battle, this Loomian instantly recovers from status ailments.

name: Radiance
description: Using Light-type moves may cause the foe to be dazed.

name: Raging Fire
description: When struck by a Fire-type attack, this Loomian absorbs it to recover Energy.

name: Razor Sharp
description: This Loomian's Melee attacks land critical hits more often.

name: Reaper
description: Harvest the life essence of foes you KO. Heals 25% of your Max Health, 50% if the foe is Light-type.

name: Rechargable
description: When struck by a Electric-type attack, this Loomian absorbs it to boost its Speed.

name: Regift
description: When targeted by another Loomian's support move, send it back to the user.

name: Regurgitate
description: When you get knocked out, spit stomach acid on your foes, lowering their defenses.

name: Replicate
description: Mimic your opponent's ability.

name: Repugnant
description: When attacked by a chomp-like move, damage is reduced, and you may also leave the attacker poisoned.

name: Resentful
description: When knocked out by another Loomian's move, deal equal damage to them as final revenge.

name: Resilience
description: Boosts your Melee Defense each time another Loomian's move makes contact with you.

name: Rev Up
description: Accelerate at the end of each turn, boosting your speed.

name: Reverberate
description: While you are in battle, Loomians cannot fall asleep.

name: Salvage
description: If not holding an item of its own, this Loomian may recycle an item that was used or dropped.

name: Scorching Skin
description: A Loomian whose attacks come into direct contact with this one may be left with a burn.

name: Shakedown
description: When joining the battle, search your opponents and reveal their equipped items.

name: Sharp Claws
description: Moves that make direct contact increase in Strength.

name: Sharp Edges
description: When another Loomian's move comes into contact with you, they receive some damage.

name: Sharp Focus
description: Moves that have less than 100% Accuracy are boosted to 100% Accuracy and costs 10% more Energy.

name: Slick Shell
description: This Loomian's Ranged Defense is doubled.

name: Slimy
description: When the possessor is hit by a contact move, the attacker will have its Speed lowered by one stage.

name: Sly
description: The effects of the foe's item are bypassed when attacking, or being attacked by, this Loomian.

name: Specialization
description: The fewer moves this Loomian knows, the more power it can put into them.

name: Staunch
description: Your stats are not lowered by others' moves or abilities.

name: Sugar Rush
description: Your Speed is doubled when you consume your equipped item.

name: Surrogate
description: When an ally is knocked out in battle, take over its Ability.

name: Swampy
description: This Loomian's Plant-type attacks have a chance to lower the target's Speed.

name: Sweet Aroma
description: When you hit the opponent with a move that makes contact, they will be trapped in battle until the end of the next turn.

name: Sweet Touch
description: When another Loomian's move comes into contact with you, they may decide to continue using that move for a few turns.

name: Tank
description: Halves the damage of the first hit this Loomian takes in battle.

name: Temper
description: When hit by a move that brings this Loomian's Health below half, its Ranged Attack is boosted.

name: Terrifying
description: Strike fear into your foes as you enter battle, lowering their Melee Attack.

name: Territorial
description: Threatened by Loomians of the same gender, you attack harder. However, you tend to strike the opposite gender weaker.

name: Thriving Pace
description: Increases your speed when you are afflicted with a status.

name: Tone Deaf
description: Attacks which utilize sound deal 20% more damage.

name: Total Eclipse
description: When struck by a Light- or Dark-type attack, this Loomian absorbs it to boost its Speed.

name: Toxic Filter
description: Attracts all Toxic-type moves to this Loomian, which absorbs them to boost its next Air-type attack.

name: Toxic Spines
description: When another Loomian's move comes into contact with you, they may become poisoned.

name: Toxic Touch
description: When another Loomian's move comes into contact with you, they may become poisoned.

name: Trash Armor
description: This Loomian's Melee Defense is boosted 50%.

name: Turbulent
description: Your Typeless moves become Air-type. The Strength of these moves is boosted a little.

name: Two Face
description: Turn yourself into a copy of the opponent upon entering the battle.

name: Ungracious Host
description: If another Loomian tries to leech Health from you, they will be damaged instead.

name: Vengeance
description: When this Loomian witnesses an ally get knocked out in battle, its next attack will hit with double the strength.

name: Vicious
description: Your attacks deal 50% more Damage when you are poisoned.

name: Vigilant
description: Ensure that you and your allies stay awake during battle.

name: Vigorous
description: Ensure that you and your allies stay awake during battle.This Loomian's Melee Attack is boosted when it is inflicted with a status condition.

name: Virtuoso
description: Use 25% less Energy when perform moves which utilize sound.

name: Viscid
description: A sticky coating prevents you from being forced off of the battlefield from your opponents' moves.

name: Vivid Sight
description: Moves used by this Loomian have increased accuracy.

name: Volcanic
description: When using a Fire-type move, this Loomian exerts eruptive force that doubles the Strength of the move, but renders it unable to move the next turn.

name: Watcher
description: This Loomian attacks with boosted Strength when it is the last to go.

name: Webbing
description: When an opponent's attack causes contact with this Loomian, their Speed is lowered.

name: Wholesome
description: This Loomian takes reduced damage from Brawler and Mind type moves.

name: Wise
description: When using a move that is not very effective against your target, utlilize other advantages to double the power of that move.

name: Woodsman
description: When hit by a Plant-type move, absorb it to boost your Melee Attack.
